thread.title: A new CG-animated movie based on Resident Evil is in the works
thread.title_full: A new CG-animated movie based on Resident Evil is in the works

title: A new CG-animated movie based on Resident Evil is in the works
text:
Friday, Oct 16 2015, 00:09 BST Share on Facebook Share on Google+ A brand-new CG-animated movie based on Resident Evil is coming.The forthcoming film's working title is Resident Evil CG 3 and will be the third animated adaptation of Capcom 's long-running horror series - following suit of Biohazard 4D-Executer and Resident Evil: Damnation . 
Â© Capcom The movie will be written by Psycho-Pass 's Makoto Fukami and directed by Hard Revenge Milly 's Takanori Tsujimoto.In addition, The Grudge director Takashi Shimizu is attached as an executive producer - allowing him to oversee the production. Resident Evil game producer Hiroyuki Kobayashi is on board as well as an executive supervisor for the project. Resident Evil CG 3 is slated for a 2017 worldwide release.Meanwhile, Capcom's Resident Evil division is reportedly focusing on virtual reality and working on a new engine designed for the tech.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy 's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
